name: Parkitect (itch)
description:
this game is a sandbox  and business simulation game where you build and manage  your own them park and stuff. build rides. get your own theme park. download the game below.

                disclaimer

this game is not a free game and it is on steam, and the only reason you are able to download the game for free right here is because this is bought with real money and this is a copy of the real game. And no I did not make this game feel free to download the game below.
